text: The current translation API does not account for locale-specific datetime parsing, leading to incorrect message timings and potential miscommunication in scheduling or event-based conversations.
For Spanish-to-English, 24-hour times will be converted to 12-hour format with appropriate AM/PM context.
For English-to-Spanish, AM/PM markers will be resolved into 24-hour equivalents.
The regex module will rely on language detection and handle edge cases like " mediodía " ( noon ) and " medianoche " ( midnight ) appropriately .
